thread.title: Paul King Latham Jr.
thread.title_full: Disc Makers reviewed by Paul King Latham Jr.

author: Paul King Latham Jr.
title: Paul King Latham Jr.
text:
I released my first CD in 2002. Disc Makers was there for the entire process. As I have grown in my skills and abilities they have been there to assist me in my career as an artist. I have grown to learn the importance of timing and quality as it pertains to total packaging. Disc Makers has been a key player in helping my organization become more fluent in the industry over the years. I am both grateful and impressed.
Thank You
Disc Makers
